snippet: President Hugo Chávez named Foreign Minister Nicolás Maduro, a former bus driver, as his new vice president on Wednesday in the first cabinet change since his re-election on Sunday.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez names Foreign Min Nicolas Maduro, former bus driver, as his new vice president in first cabinet change since his re-election; Maduro is seen as one possible successor to Chavez, who has cancer.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez named Foreign Minister Nicolás Maduro, a former bus driver, as his new vice president on Wednesday in the first cabinet change since his re-election on Sunday.

headline.seo: Foreign Minister Nicolás Maduro Named Vice President of Venezuela
